message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a good starting point, but with inflation, I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Alice, let's be realistic. Inflation is eating away at this deal with each round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution now.
I understand your point about inflation, but I still think I can get a better deal. This is my compromise.
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. Inflation makes further negotiation pointless.
